name: Spacelane Sweeper
description:
A short game about flying a spaceship that can lob bombs at debris in order to protect your fleet.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow KeysMovementSPACEBARLaunch Bomb
1, 2, 3Swap Abilities

Your fleet is on a direct crash course for hazardous debris!

Teleport ahead of the convoy and use your explosive arsenal to clear a safe path for them.
